      public ElephantsAndRhinos​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> spaces)
      Creates a
      Parameters:
      spaces - An ArrayList of the different positions of pachyderms. Each element must be either "E", "R", or " ".
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If any element in spaces is not a legal string.
